Create the plot with the unidimensional analysis

plot_unidim_analysis.Rd

Create the plot with the unidimensional analysis

plot_unidim_analysis(data_sensory)

Arguments

data_sensory

Tibble. The sensory data.

Value

A ggplotly

Examples

data("data_sensory_toy")

plot_unidim_analysis(
  data_sensory = data_sensory_toy
)
